customDetailFormulas.calculatedFormula: if(Case.CH_AssignedDate__c<NOW() && STOPPED_TIME_DAYS>0 && Case.CH_Status__c="Pending Customer", "ðŸ“’ CTwE: " & TEXT(ROUND(NOW()-Case.CH_AssignedDate__c-(NOW()-Case.CH_Time_Stamp_Customer_Pending__c)-STOPPED_TIME_DAYS,2)) & " days", IF(Case.CH_AssignedDate__c<NOW() && STOPPED_TIME_DAYS>0 && Case.CH_Status__c!="Pending Customer", "ðŸ“’ CTwE: " & TEXT(ROUND(NOW()-Case.CH_AssignedDate__c-STOPPED_TIME_DAYS,2)) & " days", IF (STOPPED_TIME_DAYS=0 && Case.CH_Status__c="Pending Customer"/* && NOW()-Case.CH_AssignedDate__c-(NOW()-Case.CH_Time_Stamp_Customer_Pending__c) < 1*/, "ðŸ“˜ CTwE: " & LPAD(TEXT(ROUND(NOW()-Case.CH_AssignedDate__c-(NOW()-Case.CH_Time_Stamp_Customer_Pending__c),2)),4,'0') & " days", IF(ISNULL(STOPPED_TIME_DAYS) && Case.CH_Status__c="Pending Customer" && NOW() - Case.CH_Time_Stamp_Customer_Pending__c >1, "DiP: " & TEXT(ROUND(NOW() - Case.CH_Time_Stamp_Customer_Pending__c,2)) & " days", IF(ISNULL(STOPPED_TIME_DAYS) && Case.CH_Status__c="Pending Customer" && NOW() - Case.CH_Time_Stamp_Customer_Pending__c < 1, "DiP: " & LPAD(TEXT(ROUND(NOW() - Case.CH_Time_Stamp_Customer_Pending__c,2)),4,'0') & " days", IF(NOW()-Case.CH_AssignedDate__c < 1 && not ISNULL(STOPPED_TIME_DAYS), "ðŸ“— CTwE: " & LPAD(TEXT(ROUND(NOW()-Case.CH_AssignedDate__c,2)),4,'0') & " days", "ðŸ“— CTwE: " & TEXT(ROUND(NOW()-Case.CH_AssignedDate__c,2)) & " days"))))))
customDetailFormulas.label: Case Time with Engineer

Report.description: How long Milestone related Cases are with engineer from 1830 EU. Only active cases without Pending Time are presented here.

filter.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND (5 OR (6 AND 7))

criteriaItems.value: Abdul Awal,Christian Prikoszovich,Mario Schlosser,Elisabeth Becker,Christian Wittig,Michael Bauer,Stuart Hickman,Thomas Mascherek,Johannes Ihm,Oleksandr Sevkovych,Konstantyn Shaynikov,Juergen Seyffer,Adam Jagodzinski
